topics.body:
it's amazing how when my father hears world news on the radio his response is instantly
"Who gives a fuck, it's not our country who cares?"
he's a surprisingly close minded man
he may also be a homophobe
he says he thinks it's alright

but he seriously doesn't understand that saying faggot isn't okay
we have actually tried to explain
he doesn't get it
